metadata.subject: Tax collection

metadata.title: [Circular letter on tax collection in Basse-Normandie]
metadata.creator: Basse-Normandie (France). Commission intermédiaire-provinciale
Basse-Normandie (France). Commission intermédiaire-provinciale
metadata.description: Signed: Les députés composant la commission-intermédiaire provinciale de Basse-Normandie ..
At head of text: Caen, 12 mars 1790

Text begins: La rentrée, Messieurs, & le recouvrement des impositions de 1790, importent tellement au bonheur de la nation, qu vous regarderez certainement l'opération de la confection des rôles ..
"La commission-intermédiaire, à MM. les officiers municipaux d [blank]"--Bottom of p. [1]
Not in Martin & Walter. Révolution française
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title is on the cover page. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Damaged, stained and/or loose pages. No page numbers.
